<p><object data="http://www.twitch.tv/widgets/archive_embed_player.swf" height="378" id="clip_embed_player_flash" type="application/x-shockwave-flash" width="420"><param name="movie" value="http://www.twitch.tv/widgets/archive_embed_player.swf"><param name="allowScriptAccess" value="always"><param name="allowNetworking" value="all"><param name="allowFullScreen" value="true"><param name="flashvars" value="title=%255BMrGTV%255D%2B%2522R.I.P.%2Bmy%2Bfriends.%2522&channel=mrglasco&auto_play=false&start_volume=25&chapter_id=5175858"></object><br/>Poor <a href="http://bit.ly/1yte9cB"><strong>MrGlasco</strong></a>. Two of the finest members of his crew, Roley and Barbald died as heroes. As such, they were given a heroic tribute by his crewmates. Make sure to pay your respects by watching this video.</p>
I don't mean to be disrespectful, but ... how did they die?

I don't mean to be disrespectful, but ... how did they die?

As heroes. Lol idk

If Xacktar did this for every kerbal he's lost...
This take role play to a whole new level!
Just asking, where did he get the model pack for the graveyard and such?
